channel.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
channel.description:
[url]https://www.escapistmagazine.com/forums/read/7.329076-Valve-Guy-Makes-His-Half-Life-3-T-Shirt-Talk[/url]
Until we get word from Valve, I'm filing this under rumor. But I still just jizzed a little.

item.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
All I’m saying is I saw this at a local game developer event worn by a Valve employee. https://twitpic.com/7mxh6r #HalfLife3 #ValveTrolling

Source

employee - a person working for another person or a business firm for pay.

Not saying he’s not trolling, but I am saying that he said Valve employee.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee

item.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Whoever this guy is, he’s a master troll. Also; it doesn’t say anywhere in that guy’s twitter post that the guy works at Valve.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee

item.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Killa:

Wasn’t trying to start anything. Just was pointing out something that I read a while back. If there is one thing I have learned is post something once here and never look back. Cause your the one kind of starting to fuel the fire. I was just saying “I was sure…” Sorry that giving my opinion causes you to hate on it.

And I found a article on it. https://gamerant.com/valve-no-more-episodes-half-life-3-robk-83787/
I was sure I read it somewhere. Again sorry that my opinion wasn’t something that you approve.

I don’t mind your opinion, I just would prefer not to see the debate start again. It’s already occurred many times on these forums and people get surprisingly upset over it, when, even in the gaming world, it’s a moot point. Not trying to offend anyone, just trying to keep the peace. :freeman:

BahamutBBob:

I’m sure I speak for a few people here when I say, I don’t care, as long as the product makes it to my hard drive :hmph:

QFT

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Orpheon:

I like it. And guys, whatever you do, please don’t start the Episode 3 vs Half Life 3 debate again. It never goes anywhere.

I’m sure I speak for a few people here when I say, I don’t care, as long as the product makes it to my hard drive :hmph:

gibbelin:

That’s what they said about the Portal 2 box art…

And the original Orange Box box art.

item.title: Half-Life 3 shirt spotted on Valve Employee
item.dc:creator: Killa
item.description:
The Laughing Man:

So, trolls on HL2:EP3. What a news!

I’m very sure Valve mention they would be done naming their games with episodes. It’s been a while but I was sure that they told us that already. It should be HL3. I’m just happy to see more news come up about it.

Which actually from a more recent post. I think it was hinted at the fact that Portal 2 engine would some how be used in HL3. Hope so cause it was a great.

Read full topic
